en-US.label: Conference Manager
en-US.description: Manage your Conferences in this App.
en-US.extended_description: Conference manager provides an intuitive experience for conferencing activities. This is perfect for users managing one or multiple conferences in unison. Account set up is as easy as assigning a conference bridge, phone number and pin. Once these items are confirmed, the user can schedule immediately. As a moderator, the user can initiate and end conferences on demand, see all activity for live participants and manage microphones, all in real-time.
features: View real-time activity of participants and moderators
Lock, mute and end live conferences
Select from a multitude of dial ins, using various country codes, while only accumulating local call charges
Customize controls to enhance conference experience
